configs.name: datanode_config_safety_valve
configs.value:
<property>
          <name>dfs.thrift.datanode.address</name>
          <value>0.0.0.0:20005</value>
          <description>
            The address where the Thrift datanode server will listen to.
            If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.
          </description>
        </property>

configs.name: agent_config_file
configs.value:
tier1.sources  = source1
tier1.channels = channel1
tier1.sinks    = sink1

tier1.channels.channel1.type   = memory
tier1.channels.channel1.capacity = 10000
tier1.channels.channel1.transactionCapacity = 1000

tier1.sinks.sink1.channel      = channel1
tier1.sources.source1.channels = channel1

tier1.sources.source1.type     = exec
tier1.sources.source1.command  = tail -F /var/log/cloudera-scm-agent/cloudera-scm-agent.log
tier1.sinks.sink1.type         = avro
tier1.sinks.sink1.hostname     = nightly61x-1.vpc.cloudera.com
tier1.sinks.sink1.port         = 9099


tier2.sources  = source1
tier2.channels = channel1
tier2.sinks    = sink1

tier2.channels.channel1.type   = memory
tier2.channels.channel1.capacity = 100000
tier2.channels.channel1.transactionCapacity = 10000

tier2.sinks.sink1.channel      = channel1
tier2.sources.source1.channels = channel1

tier2.sources.source1.type     = avro
tier2.sources.source1.port     = 9099
tier2.sources.source1.bind     = 0.0.0.0
tier2.sinks.sink1.type         = null
